author: sascharodekamp
msg: EntityListIterator not being closed after storing incoming email (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4424). A slightly modified  patch from Varun Bhansaly which closes the entity Iterator after use: CommunicationEventServices.buildListOfWorkEffortInfoFromEmailAddresses() does not close the entity list iterator resulting in error messages.
